data.name: Rotor
data.detailed_description:
Rotor is a physics-based drone racing arcade providing competitive and fast paced races through dynamic environments.
It features indoor and outdoor tracks, with dynamic obstacles and animated events, set in places from all over the world. Timing and reflexes are everything. Race, test your flying skills trying to keep up with fast vehicles and crazy stuntmen or challenge other players to be the fastest on track!
data.about_the_game:
Rotor is a physics-based drone racing arcade providing competitive and fast paced races through dynamic environments.
It features indoor and outdoor tracks, with dynamic obstacles and animated events, set in places from all over the world. Timing and reflexes are everything. Race, test your flying skills trying to keep up with fast vehicles and crazy stuntmen or challenge other players to be the fastest on track!
data.short_description: Rotor is a physics-based drone racing arcade providing competitive and fast paced races through dynamic environments. It features indoor and outdoor tracks, with dynamic obstacles and animated events, set in places from all over the world. Timing and reflexes are everything.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 2.9 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX970 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.6 GHz or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX1060 or AMD equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
